titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that the United States should initiate negotiations to enter into a free trade agreement with the Republic of Tunisia.
A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that the United States should initiate negotiations to enter into a free trade agreement with the Republic of Tunisia.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: This resolution urges the United States to begin negotiations to enter a free trade agreement with Tunisia.
